I will ask my guide, David to see if he can find you, and let me know what =
 
it is you are hiding, but he may not like this kind of thing, he "will no=
t 
be  put to the test." is what he says.  But, i will ask him, ok?
 
 
In =
a message dated 7/10/2010 5:56:08 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
rasterer@ya=
hoo.com writes:

 
 
 
Considering the attacks people continue to make agai=
nst  me on here just 
for having a different opinion of people's results, I=
  think you will 
understand why I will not post my name and address  here.=


Try anyway though.  I don't know how your personal  beliefs here work, bu=
t 
others seem to get messages about people they've  never heard of, or pla=
ces 
they've never seen.

I would also  suggest anyone who tries this exper=
iment, to post your 
results on the  list here rather than sending them per=
sonally to me - so I won't 
be  accused of losing any.



--- On Sat, 7/10/=
10,  SnowfireL@...,<SnowfireL@...>  wrote:


From:  SnowfireL@aol.F=
rom<SnowfireL@...>
Subject: Re:  [EVP-ITC] Experiment 20100710
To:  EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroupsTo: 
Date: Saturday, July 10, 2010, 2:49  PM


 
What is yo=
ur name RJ? and where do you live?  There are  probably tons of 
RJ's in th=
is world, and if i am going to ask any of  my guides if they want 
to play =
this game with you, I will not ask them  to run around the world a 
lookin =
for you. sf
 
 
In a message dated 7/10/2010 3:32:51 P.M. Eastern Daylight =
Time,  
rasterer@yahoo. com writes:

 

I have placed a little something on=
 top of my computer  monitor, right in 
front of me. It is now 7/10/2010. I=
 will leave it  there 4 days, and remove 
it Noon Denver time, on Wednesday=
,  7/14/2010.

All you have to do is ask your boxes/spirits/  aliens/etc, w=
hat it is.

I have taken a picture of it, and  posted it to the files secti=
on here, so 
there is no way I can squirm  out of the results:

_http://tec=
h. groups.yahoo. com/group/  EVP-ITC/files/ RJ/RJ.20100710. 
1.zip_ (http:/=
/tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/RJ/RJ.20100710.1.zip) 

Please d=
o not try to  open the file before noon Wednesday. But feel free to 
downlo=
ad it to  your computer beforehand, so you can be sure I won't change 
it  =
during, or after, the test.

Answers anyone reveals after noon  Wednesday d=
on't count. Partial answers 
(like just the color, or  shape, or some emoti=
on vibe) don't count. Just tell 
me what it  is.

Best of Luck. I hope for =
this to be a regularly occurring  experiment, and 
I hope we all can learn =
from the results.  












--part1_e966f.20efce85.396a4820_boundary
